comprehensive overview: Kraken 2 is a bioinformatics tool used for taxonomic classification of DNA sequences from metagenomic samples. It efficiently assigns taxonomic labels to sequencing reads based on k-mer matching and a pre-built reference database, providing insights into the microbial composition of environmental samples.
core features: Classification of metagenomic sequences based on k-mer matching
Utilizes reference databases for taxonomic assignment
Identification of microbial diversity in complex samples
